titles.title: No Debt Forgiveness for SPOILED Students Act
No Debt Forgiveness for Self-Centered Pupils at Overpriced Institutions Lacking Effectively Disciplined Students Act
No Debt Forgiveness for SPOILED Students Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to terminate the eligibility of certain individuals for student loan forgiveness, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
